title: Bioactive components and mechanisms of the traditional Chinese herbal formula Xuefu Zhuyu formula in the treatment of cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases.
abstract: The rapid increase in cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases (CCVDs) is a significant threat to human health. Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) offers unique therapeutic advantages. Xuefu Zhuyu Formula (XFZYF), a classic TCM prescription, has been widely used in clinical practice to treat CCVDs and other related conditions.
